tool_description: Optimizes lead compounds by suggesting structural modifications to improve desired properties while maintaining activity.

lead_smiles.description: SMILES string of lead compound to optimize

target_properties.description: Properties to optimize: potency, selectivity, admet, toxicity, drug_likeness

optimization_strategy.description: Optimization approach: conservative, moderate, or aggressive

preserve_scaffolds.description: Whether to preserve core scaffold during optimization

num_suggestions.description: Number of optimized structures to generate (1-50)

property_weights.description: Relative importance weights for target properties

synthetic_accessibility.description: Whether to consider synthetic accessibility in optimization

error_messages: Invalid lead SMILES: Provide a valid starting compound structure
Invalid target properties: Use properties from [potency, selectivity, admet, toxicity, drug_likeness]
Invalid optimization strategy: Use one of [conservative, moderate, aggressive]
Invalid suggestion count: Must be between 1-50
Property weight mismatch: Number of weights must match number of target properties
Optimization failed: Unable to generate improved compounds with given constraints
usage: Input lead compound and specify which properties to optimize. Configure optimization strategy and constraints based on your project requirements.

improvement_scores.description: Overall improvement scores for each suggestion

property_predictions.description: Predicted property values for optimized compounds

modification_types.description: Types of modifications made to the lead compound
